elements.name: alaWorkspaceResourceId
elements.label: Ala Workspace Resource Id
elements.toolTip: Log analytics workspace for diagnostic logs. (Default: "")

elements.name: applicationNameTag
elements.label: Application Name Tag
elements.toolTip: Details about the application.

elements.name: asgResourceId
elements.label: Asg Resource Id
elements.toolTip: Application Security Group (ASG) for the session hosts. (Default: "")

elements.name: avsetResourceId
elements.label: Avset Resource Id
elements.toolTip: Availability set resource ID. (Default: "")

elements.name: customImageDefinitionId
elements.label: Custom Image Definition Id
elements.toolTip: Source custom image ID. (Default: "")

elements.name: computeSubscriptionId
elements.label: Compute Subscription Id
elements.toolTip: Subscription ID where to deploy session hosts. (Default: )

elements.name: computeRgResourceGroupName
elements.label: Compute Rg Resource Group Name
elements.toolTip: Resource Group name where to deploy session hosts. (Default: )

elements.name: count
elements.label: Count
elements.toolTip: Quantity of session hosts to deploy. (Default: 1)

elements.name: countIndex
elements.label: Count Index
elements.toolTip: The session host number to begin with for the deployment. (Default: )

elements.name: customNaming
elements.label: Custom Naming
elements.toolTip: AVD resources custom naming. (Default: false)

elements.name: createIntuneEnrollment
elements.label: Create Intune Enrollment
elements.toolTip: Required, Eronll session hosts on Intune. (Default: false)

elements.name: configureFslogix
elements.label: Configure Fslogix
elements.toolTip: Deploy Fslogix setup. (Default: false)

elements.name: createResourceTags
elements.label: Create Resource Tags
elements.toolTip: Apply tags on resources and resource groups. (Default: false)

elements.name: costCenterTag
elements.label: Cost Center Tag
elements.toolTip: Cost center of owner team. (Default: Contoso-CC)

elements.name: diskEncryptionSetResourceId
elements.label: Disk Encryption Set Resource Id
elements.toolTip: AVD disk encryption set resource ID to enable server side encyption. (Default: "")

elements.name: departmentTag
elements.label: Department Tag
elements.toolTip: Department that owns the deployment, (Dafult: Contoso-AVD)

elements.name: dataClassificationTag
elements.label: Data Classification Tag
elements.toolTip: Sensitivity of data hosted (Default: Non-business)

elements.name: diskZeroTrust
elements.label: Disk Zero Trust
elements.toolTip: Enables a zero trust configuration on the session host disks. (Default: false)

elements.name: deployMonitoring
elements.label: Deploy Monitoring
elements.toolTip: Deploy AVD monitoring resources and setings. (Default: false)

elements.name: deploymentEnvironment
elements.label: Deployment Environment
elements.toolTip: The name of the resource group to deploy. (Default: Dev)

elements.name: deploymentPrefix
elements.label: Deployment Prefix
elements.toolTip: The name of the resource group to deploy. (Default: AVD1)

validations.message: The value must have a length of at least 2.
The value must have a length of at most 4.

elements.name: domainJoinUserName
elements.label: Domain Join User Name
elements.toolTip: AVD session host domain join user principal name. (Default: NoUsername)

elements.name: diskType
elements.label: Disk Type
elements.toolTip: OS disk type for session host. (Default: Standard_LRS)

elements.name: domainJoinPasswordSecretName
elements.label: Domain Join Password Secret Name
elements.toolTip: Domain join user password keyvault secret name. (Default: domainJoinUserPassword)

elements.name: enableAcceleratedNetworking
elements.label: Enable Accelerated Networking
elements.toolTip: Enables accelerated Networking on the session hosts. (Default: true)

elements.name: fslogixStorageAccountName
elements.label: Fslogix Storage Account Name
elements.toolTip: FSLogix storage resource ID. (Default: )

elements.name: fslogixFileShareName
elements.label: Fslogix File Share Name
elements.toolTip: FSLogix file share name. (Default: )

elements.name: hostPoolResourceId
elements.label: Host Pool Resource Id
elements.toolTip: AVD Host Pool resource ID. (Default: )

elements.name: identityDomainName
elements.label: Identity Domain Name
elements.toolTip: FQDN of on-premises AD domain, used for FSLogix storage configuration and NTFS setup. (Default: "")

elements.name: subnetResourceId
elements.label: Subnet Resource Id
elements.toolTip: AVD subnet name. (Default: )

elements.name: location
elements.label: Location
elements.toolTip: Location where to deploy compute services. (Default: )

elements.name: sessionHostCustomNamePrefix
elements.label: Session Host Custom Name Prefix
elements.toolTip: AVD session host prefix custom name. (Default: vmapp1duse2)

validations.message: The value must have a length of at most 11.

elements.name: useAvailabilityZones
elements.label: Use Availability Zones
elements.toolTip: Creates an availability zone and adds the VMs to it. Cannot be used in combination with availability set nor scale set. (Default: true)

elements.name: identityServiceProvider
elements.label: Identity Service Provider
elements.toolTip: The service providing domain services for Azure Virtual Desktop. (Default: ADDS)

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Vm Size
elements.toolTip: Session host VM size. (Default: Standard_D4ads_v5)

elements.name: securityType
elements.label: Security Type
elements.toolTip: Specifies the securityType of the virtual machine. "ConfidentialVM" and "TrustedLaunch" require a Gen2 Image. (Default: TrustedLaunch)

elements.name: secureBootEnabled
elements.label: Secure Boot Enabled
elements.toolTip: Specifies whether secure boot should be enabled on the virtual machine. This parameter is part of the UefiSettings. securityType should be set to TrustedLaunch or ConfidentialVM to enable UefiSettings. (Default: true)

elements.name: vTpmEnabled
elements.label: V Tpm Enabled
elements.toolTip: Specifies whether vTPM should be enabled on the virtual machine. This parameter is part of the UefiSettings. securityType should be set to TrustedLaunch or ConfidentialVM to enable UefiSettings. (Default: true)

elements.name: useSharedImage
elements.label: Use Shared Image
elements.toolTip: Set to deploy image from Azure Compute Gallery. (Default: false)

elements.name: vmLocalUserName
elements.label: Vm Local User Name
elements.toolTip: VM local administrator username. (Default: )

elements.name: keyVaultResourceId
elements.label: Key Vault Resource Id
elements.toolTip: Resource ID of keyvault that contains credentials. (Default: )

elements.name: vmLocalAdminPasswordSecretName
elements.label: Vm Local Admin Password Secret Name
elements.toolTip: VM local admin keyvault secret name. (Default: )

elements.name: sessionHostOuPath
elements.label: Session Host Ou Path
elements.toolTip: OU path to join AVd VMs. (Default: "")

elements.name: osImage
elements.label: Os Image
elements.toolTip: AVD OS image SKU. (Default: win11-21h2)

elements.name: time
elements.label: Time
elements.toolTip: Do not modify, used to set unique value for resource deployment.

elements.name: workloadNameTag
elements.label: Workload Name Tag
elements.toolTip: The name of workload for tagging purposes. (Default: Contoso-Workload)

elements.name: workloadTypeTag
elements.label: Workload Type Tag
elements.toolTip: Reference to the size of the VM for your workloads (Default: Light)

elements.name: workloadCriticalityTag
elements.label: Workload Criticality Tag
elements.toolTip: Criticality of the workload. (Default: Low)

elements.name: workloadCriticalityCustomValueTag
elements.label: Workload Criticality Custom Value Tag
elements.toolTip: Tag value for custom criticality value. (Default: Contoso-Critical)

elements.name: workloadSlaTag
elements.label: Workload Sla Tag
elements.toolTip: Service level agreement level of the worload. (Contoso-SLA)

elements.name: opsTeamTag
elements.label: Ops Team Tag
elements.toolTip: Team accountable for day-to-day operations. (workload-admins@Contoso.com)

elements.name: ownerTag
elements.label: Owner Tag
elements.toolTip: Organizational owner of the AVD deployment. (Default: workload-owner@Contoso.com)
